summary: This mod adds more variation to the weight slider, allowing the creation of characters that range from really skinny to really chubby.
descriptionHtml:
Check also [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27640]Better Males - More Variation[/url]

[center][img]http://www.loverslab.com/attachment.php?aid=19073[/img][/center]

<><><><><><><><><><><><><><>
CBBE - MV
<><><><><><><><><><><><><><>
v0.6b

SECTIONS

1 - DESCRIPTION
2 - INSTALLATION
3 - OPTIONS
4 - CUSTOMIZATION
5 - KNOWN ISSUES/INCOMPATIBILITIES
6 - CHANGELOG
7 - CREDITS AND THANKS
8 - PERMISSIONS


1 - DESCRIPTION

First let me inform that english is not my first language. Please be patient with errors and lack of clarity.
This mod adds more variation to the weight slider, allowing the creation of characters that range from really skinny to really chubby.
This mod is a the male version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27640]Better Males - More Variation[/url]
To that purpose, it uses a custom preset of CBBE, a custom head mesh, and a custom femalehead.tri to change the head shape with the weight slider. Thanks to the kind permission of Caliente, the mod includes meshes for the body and all armors and clothes already released by Caliente for CBBE - see [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12273]Calientes Vanilla Outfits for CBBE[/url]
Those shapes affect all default races. So this mod will change the appearance of all vanilla NPCs and all custom NPCs that use your default body and head mesh.
Included is my bodyslide preset for users that want to tune the body shape to their own taste. WARNING - My bodyslide preset requires Stuffed_Bunny\'s CB++ to apply correctly (check the Customization Section of this file).


2 - INSTALLATION

a - Download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url] and install it following the included instructions.

b - Download CBBE - MV or CBBE - MV Smaller Breasts (one of the main files in this page). Download with manager and double click it to activate. Or extract the archive and copy the containing meshes folder to your skyrim/data folder, overwrite when needed.
That\'s it!


3 - OPTIONS

These are not necessary for the mod to work, the optionals are independent from each other but are ALL dependent of the Main file in this page and of CBBE original.


NEVERNUDE - If you want the nevernude version, download CBBE - MV NeverNude or CBBE - MV NeverNude Smaller Breasts (optional files in this page). Download with manager and double click it to activate. Or extract the archive and copy the containing meshes folder to your skyrim/data folder, overwrite when needed.

KILLERKEO ADDON - If you want more Armors and Clothes, you can download CBBE - MV KillerKeo Addon or CBBE - MV KillerKeo Addon Smaller Breasts. These are bodyslide adjusted armors and clothes from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654]Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set[/url].
WARNING: KK Addon will REPLACE some vanilla Armors and Clothes not included in the main file with somewhat \"skimpy\" versions of vanilla armors and clothes. One might consider them \"lore breaking\" but in my opinion, KillerKeo didnt went too far in the \"skimpy\" direction and these versions are still of very good taste. Anyway, remember this is optional. The original mod is not required. Download with manager and double click to activate or extract the archive and copy the containing meshes and textures folders to your skyrim/data folder, overwrite when needed.

NOBLE CLOTHES ADDON - Requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6544]Noble Female Clothes Non-replacer[/url].  Install that mod and overwrite with the addon from here.

BBP and TBBP - Those are versions of the body with jigling motion on the breasts, they require special skeletons for females and proper breast animations. Using these versions WILL require you to read more than one set of install instructions and figure them out.
General guideline is: You need the skeleton and the animations from the jigle mods (BBP or TBBP), then you need original CBBE textures and hand and feet meshes, then you need one of the main files here, then the jigle option from here.

For BBP, check the instructions here [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod[/url]. General install order is CHSBHC first, then CBBE, then CBBE - MV and last this optional here. Or download CHSBHC manually and use just the skeleton and the animations.

For TBBP, google \"Dragonfly Tender BBP\" without quote marks and follow the instructions there. General install order is install skeleton, then animations, then CBBE, then CBBE - MV and last this optional file here.

This mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16712]Custom Skeleton Replacers[/url] offers many variations of the skeleton for compatibility with many other mods.


4 - CUSTOMIZATION

The Head - If you\'re not happy with the head shape (I know, my sculpting skills suck), I encourage you to use the included femalehead.nif and the femalehead.tri to sculpt a better one (no kidding, my sculpting really sucks). All I ask if these files are used as base for your mod is for you to include me in the thanks and give me automatic permission to use your (better) femalehead.nif and femalehead.tri files as optionals to this mod.

The Body - Man, you really got to start playing with Bodyslide - it is included in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url] and with CB++ (google \"stuffed bunny CB++\" and go to the first post in the thread there)
Bodyslide with all sliders added in CB++ allow for almost ANY human body shape conceivable to be created with a few clicks. The tool also allows you to create lots of armor and clothes adapted to the body you created.
In the main archive for this mod is included a \"Caliente Tools\" folder, paste it over your Caliente Tools folder to add the preset from this mod, fire bodyslide tool and change the body to your personal taste. 


5 - KNOWN ISSUES/INCOMPATIBILITIES

The neck is poorly sculpted, sorry I did my best.
Some armor and clothes clip a bit with the body, I\'ll try to adjust them and add to the mod in future updates.
This mod will be incompatible with any mod that changes the default femalehead.nif and the femalehead.tri files.
Will also be incompatible with mods that make the vanilla races use diferent head mesh.


6 - CHANGELOG

 - 0.6b - Neck mesh refined and hopefully less of a neck seam with default CBBE textures.

 - 0.5 - Initial release.


7 - CREDITS AND THANKS

Caliente - for creating CBBE and bodyslide and giving permission to use her work in this mod.
Stuffed_Bunny - for creating CB++ and helping me in the initial development and giving permission to use his work in this mod.
KillerKeo - for creating \"Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set\" and giving permission to use his work in this mod.
Merilia and Karmoth for creating Noble Female Clothes Non-replacer and giving permission to use their work in this mod.
Neogunbuster - for creating BodySlide Support for Noble Female Clothes Non-replacer and giving permission to use his work in this mod.
CherryHotaling - for creating CHSBHC - BBP
Dragonfly0124 - for creating Tender BBP
Sunspot2 - for creating this mod

Special thanks to Vioxsis - For exporting the .nif file each time i made a tweak (read \"a lot of times\") and never complaining.


8 - PERMISSIONS

Please do not upload this mod in another website without my express consent.
The only resources completely created by me and the femalehead.nif and the femalehead.tri If you want to use these files, check the CUSTOMIZATION SECTION.
The other resources are files created by other authors and modified by me, used here with express permission from them. If you want to use these resources, PM me and I\'ll forward you to the original authors.
author: Sunspot2
